DOC.brief_summary: This study test two different approach resolution facial skin resurfacing .
DOC.brief_title: Post Treatment Care After Chemical Peel Laser Resurfacing
DOC.criteria: The informed consent document photography release must read , sign , date subject subject 's legally authorize representative conduct study procedure exams . In addition , informed consent photography release document must sign date individual consent subject conduct Visit 1 . A photocopy sign informed consent document must provide subject , original sign document place subject 's chart . Subjects 18 year age old , schedule undergo either medium chemical peel 35 % TCA laser resurface . Subjects may either sex race skin type provide skin color , opinion Investigator , interfere study assessment . Women childbearing potential ( premenarchal , surgically sterilize [ hysterectomy bilateral oophorectomy ] , postmenopausal ) may participate study meet following condition : breast feed undertake pregnancy test , must negative intend become pregnant study use adequate birth control method agree continue use method duration study Adequate birth control method define : hormonal—topical , oral , implantable , injectable contraceptive ; mechanical—spermicide conjunction barrier condom diaphragm ; IUD ; , surgical sterilization partner . For nonsexually active female , abstinence may regard adequate method birth control ; however , subject becomes sexually active study , must agree use adequate birth control method describe remainder study . NOTE : Women bilateral tubal ligation consider surgically sterilize must agree condition specify . Willing able make require study visit . Able follow instruction . Undergo medium grade chemical peel fractional resurfacing . Contraindications hypersensitivity use study medication component ( e.g. , balsam Peru , castor oil , phenoxyethanol ) . Therapy another investigational agent within thirty ( 30 ) day Visit 1 , study . Have take anticoagulant ( blood thinner , include aspirin ) within two week . Current smoker . Use oral isotretinoin past 12 month , systemic steroid , topical retinoids , topical corticosteroid within month prior study . Have congenital skin disorder affect keratinocytes , elastin , collagen . Have dermatologic disease may aggravate provoke wounding procedure . Are risk keloid hypertrophic scar formation base personal family history , skin exam . Have skin disorder cause delayed healing . Have systemic condition would compromise skin healing . The Medical Monitor may declare subject ineligible valid medical reason .
